Translations.Text: Ntibazi yuko Imana ifise ubumenyi bw’ivyo banyegeza hamwe n’ivyo baserura
Kandi hari muri abo bantu batazi gusoma, kandi batazi n’igitabu c’Imana atari igihababu atakamaro kibamariye, nabo ntaco bafise atari ugukekeranya gusa

Rero ibihano bikaze cane bizoshikira abantu bandika igitabu kumaboko yabo, hanyuma bagaca bavuga bati:- iki gitabu kivuye ku Mana kugira ngo baronke ikiguzi gitoyi c’amaronko yo ngaha kw’Isi gusa, nibagabe kuri ibi bintu banditse kumaboko yabo, kandi bagabe no kubintu bagira
Baravuze bati:- ntituzokorwa ko n’umuriro atari kumisi mikeyi gusa, wewe vuga uti:- mbega muramaze kuronka amasezerano ku Mana? Rero nayo ntizota indagano yayo, canke murabeshera Imana kubintu mutazi
Egome, abagira amabi hamwe n’amakosa yabo akabakikuza, abo nibo bantu bo mu muriro udahera, bazowuba mwo mu buzima bwabo bwose
N’abemeye Imana yabo y’ukuri nukugira ibikorwa vyiza, abo nibo bantu bo mw’Ijuru, nabo bazobayo mubuzima bwabo bwose

Mugihe twagira amasezerano n’uruvyaro rwa bene israeri yuko batazosenga uwariwe wese atari Imana yonyene gusa, kandi mukabagirira ineza abavyeyi banyu, hamwe n’abagenzi banyu, hamwe n’impfuvyi n’aboro, kandi mukavugana n’abantu mumvugo nziza kandi mugahagarika n’amasengesho n’ugutanga imperezwa hanyuma nibahindukira dukuyemwo abantu bakeyi gusa muri mwebwe, namwe mutavyitaye ho
